page.title: 12OUR VILLAGE POLICEMAN.
page.content: The policeman is involved in a great deal of community work.This is in addition to his normal duties. He can be seen assisting at the local youth club,coaching boys in football and also taking part in the Managers' meetings of the village school,as he is a Manager"with special interest in the school." He has also initiated an annual Carol Night,at Christmas Eve,outside his home.This is a very festive affair which involves most of the villagers, especially the children. He is also involved in the testing of the local schoolchildren for the Cycling Profficiency Certificate.He is very much part of the Rhuallt village community and is on first name terms with its population.
